channel.title: Tango & Cash - Half-Life ?
channel.description:
I just wonder if someone saw the movie Tango & Cash (1989, Kurt Russel, Silvester Stalone) and noticed some cool similarities betwen the movie and HL1 and Even HL2 ? Anyone ? :slight_smile:
[url]https://www.imdb.com/title/tt0098439/[/url]
Some screens ... even the crowbar is the same ... ![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg) ![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
And here comes more:
Tango and Cash sneaking through high voltage cables (usual for HL1) ![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
And here after Fist fight Tango tosses One of the bad guys betwen those cables, which very much resembles what happened to the Gargantua In the end of the "Power Up" chapter of HL1 ![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
And here is The Boss of the bad guys and te main antagonist of the movie who of course wants Tango and Cash dead ... ![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
The Big Screens And the office of course are situated in a big warehouse... Not as high as the citadel .. but matched in the security point of view ![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
Of Curse Our guys storm the place with a badass ride with attached gun to it ![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
And the main reason for that is to kill the Big Boss of course AND save Tango's Sister (Terry Hatcher when she was young) which the bastard kidnapped to make Tango and Cash go to him ... ![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)
The whole thing of course ends with demolition Of The Big Bad Boss Base and his death ... No Gunships And Alien teleport technology but still ... ![](upload://6I6PuuEmauXO02up6hgyYXrei26.jpeg)

item.title: Tango & Cash - Half-Life ?

item.description:
Half Life is more like Die Hard anyway

Read full topic

item.title: Tango & Cash - Half-Life ?
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
Here’s another spooky coincidence: I hear there’s a movie discussion board with a Tango & Cash subforum, and someone posted a thread there saying they’d noticed some similarities between T&C and the game Half-Life, and the thread fill with whiny douchefags who all posted the same childish sarcasm like it was the world’s best joke and they’d just invented it.

Uncanny, no?

Read full topic

item.title: Tango & Cash - Half-Life ?
item.dc:creator: eXitman
item.description:
Jack:

There’s also a guy in a suit! Like G-MAN! LIKE HALF LIFE!!! :fffuuu:

Yea, … There is such a guy in the movie … also Ugly … wearing a black suit and suitcase but missing the tie piece …

He plays the Bite in the murder set up Ffor Tango and Cash …

Here … Teh same guy stalked by Tango

Few seconds later the Bite is like 2 steps before Tango on a terrace in the other side of the hall on the second floor …

His Shadow fleeing around the corner …

At the same moment Tango witn the "WTF THIS GUY’S A GHOST !?1!.!? o.O " expression …

Here he hides for the last time Before Tango and Cash met at the Crime scene and actually didn’t manage to catch him …

Read full topic

item.description:
I said Folded stock shotgun i didn’t say SPAS because its not … Anyway Cash’s Magnum is fitted with some kind of 80’s aimpoint/red dot … Also the magnum in the DM mode of HL1 has a red dot for secondary mode …

item.title: Tango & Cash - Half-Life ?
item.dc:creator: eXitman
item.description:
Christ … Guys seriously, do you even red why i’ve posted in the FIRST post of thread ? Looked at the IMDb link ? The movie came out 1989 (My mom was pregnant with me then probably) … How can it copy things from a video game which came out nearly 10 years after the movie ?!

My point Here, actually of the whole thread Is that the probably the developers
f the game are somehow inspired by some aspects of this other way … average late 80’s action film …

By the way … curious to know that Cash’s (Kurt Russel) personal weapon is a White Stainless Ruger GP101 .357 Magnum. ??


Read full topic

item.title: Tango & Cash - Half-Life ?
item.dc:creator: Bladex1200
item.description:
sersoft:

So you’re saying every guy who uses a crowbar as a weapon is copying half life?

Agreed. Just because a crowbar is different, doesn’t mean they’re copying Half Life. Still… Those pictures are TOO similar to Half Life. Creepy…

It’s plausible that perhaps Valve got some inspiration from this movie. But the similarities are very small.
